headline: 1 Value Stock with Competitive Advantages and 2 We Avoid
summary: Value investing has produced some of the worldâ€™s most famous investing billionaires, including Warren Buffett, David Einhorn, and Seth Klarman, who built their fortunes by purchasing wonderful businesses at reasonable prices. But these hidden gems are few and far between - many stocks that appear cheap often stay that way because they face structural issues.
